${ModID}:ShootingStar.NAME: Shooting Star
${ModID}:ShootingStar.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|0=s} next turn.

${ModID}:Impulse.NAME: Impulse
${ModID}:Impulse.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! {@@}card{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Exhaust one of them.

${ModID}:Emptiness.NAME: Emptiness
${ModID}:Emptiness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:Backtrack.NAME: Backtrack
${ModID}:Backtrack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Aggression.NAME: Aggression
${ModID}:Aggression.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ToothAndNail.NAME: Tooth And Nail
${ModID}:ToothAndNail.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RushPast.NAME: Rush Past
${ModID}:RushPast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:LongGoodbye.NAME: Long Goodbye
${ModID}:LongGoodbye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard each Ethereal card in your hand. NL Draw !M! {@@}{!M!|>1=cards|@=card}.

${ModID}:TimeSlow.NAME: Time Slow
${ModID}:TimeSlow.DESCRIPTION: You cannot take damage, lose HP, or gain debuffs this turn.
${ModID}:TimeSlow.FLAVOR: "I wish this moment could last forever."
${ModID}:TimeSlow.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: She smiled, and looked up at the stars. Things were so nice, then.

${ModID}:HazyStrike.NAME: Hazy Strike
${ModID}:HazyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Dazed to your discard pile.

${ModID}:Elude.NAME: Elude
${ModID}:Elude.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to each enemy that intends to attack.

${ModID}:Unsettle.NAME: Unsettle
${ModID}:Unsettle.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! Weak and ${ModID}:Foretold. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:InevitableForm.NAME: Inevitable Form
${ModID}:InevitableForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play the top {@@}{!M!|>1=!M! cards|@=card} of your draw pile and Exhaust {!M!|>1=them|@=it}.
${ModID}:InevitableForm.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You can always try again. You just need to keep wanting to.

${ModID}:Deluge.NAME: Deluge
${ModID}:Deluge.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:FleetingFortitude.NAME: Fleeting Fortitude
${ModID}:FleetingFortitude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.NAME: Before Your Eyes
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted due to being Ethereal, add a random card to your hand.
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: None of them could have saved her. Not that time.

${ModID}:Demoralize.NAME: Demoralize
${ModID}:Demoralize.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak, Vulnerable, and ${ModID}:Foretold. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Demoralize.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: I'm haunted- by the lives that I have loved, and actions I have hated.

${ModID}:FadeAway.NAME: Fade Away
${ModID}:FadeAway.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL A random card in your hand becomes Ethereal.

${ModID}:Dread.NAME: Dread
${ModID}:Dread.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be played if there is an Ethereal card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have an Ethereal card in my hand.
I ~will~ ~not~ have an Ethereal card in my hand?
I... ~didn't?~ have an Ethereal card in my hand.

${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.NAME: Obscuring Haze
${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If you have an Ethereal card in your hand, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Reverie.NAME: Reverie
${ModID}:Reverie.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card, then shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Reverie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw a card, then shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Reverie.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: The moon was the last thing she saw, its bright form penetrating the rain.

${ModID}:AheadOfTime.NAME: Ahead Of Time
${ModID}:AheadOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a copy of the top card of your draw pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Lacerate.NAME: Lacerate
${ModID}:Lacerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase each of the enemy's turn-based debuffs by !M!.
${ModID}:Lacerate.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: I wasn't born to fight. Maybe just a little bit. Enough to make me sick of it.

${ModID}:LetGo.NAME: Let Go
${ModID}:LetGo.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top card of your draw pile. NL {@@}Gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Accumulate.NAME: Accumulate
${ModID}:Accumulate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Apathy.NAME: Apathy
${ModID}:Apathy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength.
${ModID}:Apathy.FLAVOR: To cosmic forms from tangent planes- We end as we began.
${ModID}:Apathy.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: As you lost consciousness, you found yourself not caring. The loop will restart anyway.

${ModID}:Decimate.NAME: Decimate
${ModID}:Decimate.FLAVOR: With their final breath they look to the moon, and are gone.
${ModID}:Decimate.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: She always liked the moon. You're glad she took it with her.

${ModID}:PhaseShift.NAME: Phase Shift
${ModID}:PhaseShift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. Shuffle 2 Dazed into your discard pile.

${ModID}:DejaVu.NAME: Deja Vu
${ModID}:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Vision on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Vision.NAME: Vision
${ModID}:Vision.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You've lived through this moment hundreds of times.

${ModID}:RecurringDream.NAME: Recurring Dream
${ModID}:RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you played a *Recurring *Dream this turn or last turn.

${ModID}:Persist.NAME: Persist
${ModID}:Persist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Exchange.NAME: Exchange
${ModID}:Exchange.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Exhaust 1 card in your discard pile.

${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.NAME: Moment Of Truth
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.DESCRIPTION: Every second time you play a *Moment *Of *Truth, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.FLAVOR: This time, things will be different.
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: The rain pelted your shoulders as the moment approached. This time, things will be different.

${ModID}:Cripple.NAME: Cripple
${ModID}:Cripple.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:UnfamiliarMemory.NAME: Unfamiliar Memory
${ModID}:UnfamiliarMemory.DESCRIPTION: Every second time you play an *Unfamiliar *Memory, gain !M! Strength and Exhaust.

${ModID}:TimeSpiral.NAME: Time Spiral
${ModID}:TimeSpiral.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile with 2 less Block.

${ModID}:DoubleDown.NAME: Double Down
${ModID}:DoubleDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the enemy.

${ModID}:TimeLoop.NAME: Time Loop
${ModID}:TimeLoop.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of the last card you played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't played a card yet this combat.
I ~will~ ~not~ have played a card by then...
${ModID}:TimeLoop.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Again? Of course you'd do it again.

${ModID}:EtchedInBlood.NAME: Etched In Blood
${ModID}:EtchedInBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Next turn, add that card to your hand.

${ModID}:Forsake.NAME: Forsake
${ModID}:Forsake.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You can only play cards drawn by *Forsake this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I did not draw that card with Forsake.
I ~will~ ~not~ draw that card with Forsake...
I ~hadn't~ drawn that card with Forsake?

${ModID}:OverAndOver.NAME: Over And Over
${ModID}:OverAndOver.DESCRIPTION: Put the first card you play each turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Overwhelm.NAME: Overwhelm
${ModID}:Overwhelm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage this combat.
${ModID}:Overwhelm.FLAVOR: Each time hurts more than the last.
${ModID}:Overwhelm.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: The hooded figure grabs their chest before falling to the ground. You weren't fast enough.

${ModID}:MakeExample.NAME: Make Example
${ModID}:MakeExample.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak to ALL other enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Harrow.NAME: Harrow
${ModID}:Harrow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Manifest.NAME: Manifest
${ModID}:Manifest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL {!M!|>1=They cost|@=It costs} 0 this turn.

${ModID}:ClingingOn.NAME: Clinging On
${ModID}:ClingingOn.DESCRIPTION: The first time a card is Exhausted each turn, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Her.NAME: Her
${ModID}:Her.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Her.FLAVOR: What are you fighting for? Why won't you let yourself stop?
${ModID}:Her.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: "Don't go back for me." You've never been a good listener.

${ModID}:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
${ModID}:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}.

${ModID}:HighGround.NAME: High Ground
${ModID}:HighGround.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Flashback 1 Attack. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SawItComing.NAME: Saw It Coming
${ModID}:SawItComing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is ${ModID}:Foretold, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Glimpse.NAME: Glimpse
${ModID}:Glimpse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Vision to your discard pile.

${ModID}:InternalBleeding.NAME: Internal Bleeding
${ModID}:InternalBleeding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy, it loses !M! HP if it is Weak. Repeat for Vulnerable and ${ModID}:Foretold.
${ModID}:InternalBleeding.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: "Please! You can hear me! Right? Please..."

${ModID}:CarefulScheme.NAME: Careful Scheme
${ModID}:CarefulScheme.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain {@@}{!M!|repeat=[E] }. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s|0=s}.

${ModID}:Fathom.NAME: Fathom
${ModID}:Fathom.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL They become Ethereal.

${ModID}:SlashDash.NAME: Slash Dash
${ModID}:SlashDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NeverEnough.NAME: Never Enough
${ModID}:NeverEnough.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, ${ModID}:Flashback.

${ModID}:Monsoon.NAME: Monsoon
${ModID}:Monsoon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Monsoon.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: As the rain washed her blood away, a single thought filled your head: "It should've been me."

${ModID}:TheSecondDream.NAME: The Second Dream
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.DESCRIPTION: If you've played 3 or more Ethereal cards this turn, take an extra turn after this one. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.FLAVOR: During the dream, you remembered everything clearly.
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Every loop numbed your memory further. So many experiences. But during the dream, you were back home.

${ModID}:Lucidity.NAME: Lucidity
${ModID}:Lucidity.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Foretold to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BackupPlan.NAME: Backup Plan
${ModID}:BackupPlan.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:Precognition.NAME: Precognition
${ModID}:Precognition.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Vision into your draw pile. NL Whenever you play a *Vision, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}.

${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.NAME: The Stars Aligned
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play {@@}{!M!|>1=up to !M!|@=a} random *Vision{!M!|>1=s|0=s} from your draw pile.
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.FLAVOR: A glimpse at the stars fills you with comfort.
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Everytime I see a star, I think that after all, you're not that far.

${ModID}:Gaze.NAME: Gaze
${ModID}:Gaze.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Foretold.

${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.NAME: Eyes Wide Open
${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle {@@}{!M!|>1=!M!|@=a} *Vision{!M!|>1=s|0=s} into your draw pile.
${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle {@@}{!M!|>1=!M!|@=a} *Vision{!M!|>1=s|0=s} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:LowVisibility.NAME: Low Visibility
${ModID}:LowVisibility.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ${ModID}:Flashback a card.

${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.NAME: Reckless Abandon
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each Ethereal card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.FLAVOR: You come to your senses with blood on your clothes, and bodies behind you.
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: As you came to your senses, you realized whoever you tore apart wasn't them.

${ModID}:Prescience.NAME: Prescience
${ModID}:Prescience.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CherishedMemory.NAME: Cherished Memory
${ModID}:CherishedMemory.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Flashback !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Align.NAME: Align
${ModID}:Align.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s} from your draw pile into your hand. Add Dazed where {!M!|1=it was|@=they were}. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Align.FLAVOR: We stopped, because it started to rain.
${ModID}:Align.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You frowned, and she laughed. "There's always next time."
